name: Armor - Plate
description: This category covers the use of rigid metal armor, from metal breastplates to full Maximilian Plate armor.

name: Armor - Chain
description: This category covers the use of flexible metal armors, including chain, scale and the like.

name: Armor - Soft leather
description: This category covers the use of soft leather armor from soft leather tunics to boiled leather cuirasses and the like.

name: Armor - Rigid leather
description: This category covers the use of rigid leather armor from soft leather tunics to boiled leather cuirasses and the like.
